mapper.select: select a.blog_no as no, a.blog_title as title, a.blog_writer as "writer.id", b.user_name as "writer.name", b.user_email as "writer.email", a.blog_content as content, a.blog_likes as likes, a.blog_comment_counts as commentCounts, a.blog_created_date as createdDate from spring_blogs a, spring_users b where a.blog_no = #{value} and a.blog_writer = b.user_id
